original_text: These are all descendants of Ham. They lived in groups in their own parts of the land. Each group spoke their own language.
korean_text: 이들은 함의 자손이라 각기 족속과 언어와 지방과 나라대로였더라

sentences.original_text: These are all descendants of Ham.
in their own parts of the land.
Each group spoke their own language.
